name: fileflows
features: File automation: Process files automatically based on rules, triggers, and custom workflows for hands-free management.
Video transcoding: Convert media files between formats with configurable quality, codec, and resolution settings.
Flow designer: Build processing pipelines visually by connecting nodes for file operations, conditions, and transformations.
Library monitoring: Watch folders for new files and trigger workflows automatically when content is added.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community plugins for additional file formats and processing capabilities.
Batch processing: Handle multiple files simultaneously with parallel execution for faster completion times.
Metadata extraction: Read and modify file properties, tags, and embedded information during processing.
Notification system: Receive alerts when workflows complete, fail, or require attention via email or webhooks.
